activities: Localytics collects personal information from prospects and customers when they contact Localytics or register for our service. This information may include name, email address, and phone number. In general, this information is used to deliver and personalize services to and for the prospect or customer and to enable third parties to carry out functions related to the Localytics service on Localytics’ behalf. Localytics also automatically collects information on behalf of its customers, as part of their use of our service. With the exception of IP address, the information is non-identifiable, non-personal data used to provide our customers with analyses of how their users are using their applications. IP addresses are collected as part of the standard operation of our web service and are only stored in logs used for performance monitoring. These logs are routinely deleted.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
